summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1403, for the improvement of West McGraw Street, from 7th Avenue West, to 9th Avenue West, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle by constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden curbs, gutters and cross walks, under Ordinance No. 15286 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
